author: mariusvanderwijden
content: I just found a dumb consensus issue on pithos. Geth currently does not check if a block has valid basefee

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: Fortunately (or unfortunately) no one has tried to create a block with invalid basefee

content: I'm pretty sure my fuzzer would have found it too, will check soon
